record.dc:title: 67HA3 Hixon Mound Site 1HA3, Hamilton Co., Tennessee. Profile along L15 line between 22 and 29 lines showing two terraced working floors or benches. Direction northwest.
record.wpa:narrative: The lowest vertical face along L17 line is at level of old occupation layer beneath mound. The middle vertical face, L16 line, is at level of an early mound dome (primary mound). The top vertical face, L15 line, shows dimed layers of lensing.
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph.
